tweets.text: @BCWeather101 Interesting thought on the "Snow Shadow" here in #Chilliwack / Agassiz area. Although its still snowing here, albeit light snow as of now. We shall see how this pans out...

Snowfall totals are forecasted to be near 5 cm today through Sunday night. 
Easterly winds of 20 to 40km/h may lead to local blowing snow Sunday afternoon and evening.

urls.title: NATO secretary general to focus on arctic during Canada visit
